body_html:
Here is a blog post that was recently done by Univa that outlines an example approach to integrating distributed TensorFlow to a Grid Engine Parallel Environment. Hope this helps. Feedback and questions very welcome.

https://blogs.univa.com/2018/04/integrating-distributed-tensorflow-with-grid-engine/
body_text:

Here is a blog post that was recently done by Univa that outlines an example approach to integrating distributed TensorFlow to a Grid Engine Parallel Environment.  Hope this helps. Feedback and questions very welcome.
